statements: SELECT * FROM user_investment_history
SELECT user_id, investment_type FROM user_investment_history
SELECT investment_amount, investment_date FROM user_investment_history
SELECT * FROM user_investment_history ORDER BY investment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, investment_amount FROM user_investment_history WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, investment_type, investment_amount, investment_date FROM user_investment_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY investment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, investment_type, investment_amount, investment_date FROM user_investment_history WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM user_investment_history WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, investment_date
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, investment_type FROM user_investment_history WHERE investment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT MAX(investment_amount) AS max_investment, MIN(investment_amount) AS min_investment, AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment FROM user_investment_history WHERE investment_type = 'Real Estate'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_date;
SELECT user_id, investment_name, amount FROM investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, age, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT investment_name, amount, investment_date FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, email FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users UNION SELECT user_id, investment_name, amount FROM investments WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Investments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM Investments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_investments > 3;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM Investments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT Users.name, Recommendations.recommendation_text FROM Users JOIN Recommendations ON Users.user_id = Recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_investment FROM Investments WHERE amount > 1000 GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_investment > 50000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT username, investment_name, transaction_amount FROM users INNER JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type FROM investments WHERE investment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM financial_history WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' OR investment_type = 'ETFs' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username,email FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT user_id,investment_type,amount FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username,investments.amount,transactions.transaction_type FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id=investments.user_id JOIN transactions ON investments.investment_id=transactions.investment_id WHERE users.age < 50 AND transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT user_id,recommendation_text,recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE CAST(recommendation_date AS DATE) = '2023-05-15';
